title: What do you like best in kindergarten class? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kindergarten is really fun. I think I like all of it, like drawing and math and playtime. I only hate some people in my class, like John. He’s stupid. My teacher says not to say stupid, but she can’t see this. Stupid stupid stupid! My favorite part of kindergarten is maybe silent reading time. I’m way ahead of my class, because my mom taught me how to read when I was 3! I love books and reading, a lot a lot a lot. My mom doesn’t allow me to watch TV, she says books are better and TV makes me a grump. I don’t think so.

Children learn to socialize - that’s their first experience spending long hours with many other children of their age. This makes them grow socially and helps build tolerance for others around that’s a key in leading a successful life later.
